parameters.description: Select the type of Web Services call you wanna see

queries.text:
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' 
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 
| extend alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
| extend extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
| extend eventId = customDimensions.eventId 
, sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
, extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
, extensionInfo = strcat(extensionName, ' ', customDimensions.extensionVersion, 
    (iff(isnotempty(tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), strcat(' - ', tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), '')))
, alObjectInfo = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' - ', alObjectName)
, alStackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
, clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
, companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
, alObjectId = customDimensions.alObjectId
, alObjectType = customDimensions.alObjectType
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000  
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
)
, withUPDLOCK = iff(customDimensions.sqlStatement has 'UPDLOCK','Yes', 'No')
, numberOfJoins = countof(sqlStatement, "JOIN") 
, numberOfFlowFields = countof(sqlStatement, "OUTER APPLY") 
, extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement) )
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart:string "FROM" rest:string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = case(
    operationType == "SELECT", countof(selectPart,",") + 1
    , operationType == "SELECT'", countof(selectPart,",") + 1
    , 0
)
, isolationLevel = case(
    sqlStatement has 'WITH(UPDLOCK)', 'UPDLOCK'
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(READUNCOMMITTED)', 'ReadUncommitted'
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(READCOMMITTED)', 'ReadCommitted' 
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(REPEATABLEREAD)', 'RepeatableRead' 
  , 'Default'
)
| sort by timestamp desc 
| project timestamp, 
    ["Client Type"] = clientType, 
    ["Company"] = companyName,
    ["AL Object ID"] = alObjectId,
    ["AL Object Type"] = alObjectType,
    ["AL Object Name"] = alObjectName,
    ["Duration"] = executionTimeInMS, 
    ["Type"] = operationType, 
    ["FlowFields"] = numberOfFlowFields, 
    ["JOINs"] = numberOfJoins, 
    ["with UPDLOCK"] = withUPDLOCK,
    ["AL Object Information"] = alObjectInfo, 
    ["AL Stack Trace"] = alStackTrace,
    ["Extension Information"] = extensionInfo,
    ["SQL Statement"] = sqlStatement,
    ["Isolation Level"] = isolationLevel,
    ["User Telemetry ID"] = user_Id,
    ["Session Id"] = session_Id

let Timeouts = bctraces 
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0012'
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , stackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
| extend snapshotId = tostring( customDimensions.snapshotId )
| project snapshotId, timestamp
, ["AL Object Type"] = customDimensions.alObjectType
, ["AL Object Id"] = customDimensions.alObjectId
, ["AL Object Name"] = alObjectName
, ["AL Stack Trace"] = stackTrace
, ["AL Execution Method"] = customDimensions.alExecutingMethodScope
, ["Extension Name"] = customDimensions.extensionName
, ["Extension Version"] = customDimensions.extensionVersion
, ["User Telemetry Id"] = case(
  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A'
)
;
Timeouts
| join (bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0013'
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , stackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
| extend snapshotId = tostring( customDimensions.snapshotId )
| project snapshotId
, alObjectTypeHoldingLock = customDimensions.alObjectType
, alObjectIdHoldingLock = customDimensions.alObjectId
, alObjectNameHoldingLock = alObjectName
, alStackTraceHoldingLock = stackTrace
, alExecutionMethodHoldingLock = customDimensions.alExecutingMethodScope
, sqlTableLocked = customDimensions.sqlTableName
, sqlLockResourceType = customDimensions.sqlLockResourceType
, sqlLockRequestMode = customDimensions.sqlLockRequestMode
, sqlLockRequestStatus = customDimensions.sqlLockRequestStatus
, sqlServerSessionId = customDimensions.sqlServerSessionId
, alSessionIdHoldingLock = customDimensions.sessionId
, extensionNameHoldingLock = extensionName
, extensionVersionHoldingLock = customDimensions.extensionVersion
, clientTypeHoldingLock = customDimensions.clientType
)
on $left.snapshotId == $right.snapshotId
| order by snapshotId
| project-away snapshotId1

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' // starting from version 16.1, the eventId is used to identity signal types
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 // filter out internal server calls
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , "OTHERS"
)
, withUPDLOCK = iff(customDimensions.sqlStatement has 'UPDLOCK','Yes', 'No')
| extend isLocking = iff(withUPDLOCK == 'Yes', 'Yes', 
     iff(operationType in ("UPDATE","DELETE","INSERT"), 'Yes', 'No'))
| project timestamp, isLocking
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 10min),isLocking
| render timechart

let _maxCount = 20;
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' 
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 // filter out internal server calls
| extend alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
| extend alObjectInfo = strcat(tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType), ' ', tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId), ' - ',alObjectName)
| summarize count() by alObjectInfo
| sort by count_
| limit _maxCount

let _maxCount = 20;
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0018'
| extend extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
  , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
  , alMethod = tostring( customDimensions.alMethod) 
| extend environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
, alObjectInfo = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' - ', alObjectName)
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
, suspendedTime = customDimensions.suspendedTime // will come on 22.x
, extensionInfo = strcat( extensionName, ' ', customDimensions.extensionVersion)
, clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
, exclusiveTime = customDimensions.exclusiveTime // This dimension was introduced in Business Central 2023 release wave 1, version 22.1. Backported to version 21.6
, exclusiveTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.exclusiveTime))/10000 //the datatype for exclusiveTime is timespan 
, alStackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
, longRunningThreshold = tostring(customDimensions.longRunningThreshold)
, longRunningThresholdInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.longRunningThreshold))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
, sqlExecutes = toint(customDimensions.sqlExecutes) // This dimension was introduced in Business Central 2023 release wave 1, version 22.0
, sqlRowsRead = toint(customDimensions.sqlRowsRead) // This dimension was introduced in Business Central 2023 release wave 1, version 22.0
, usertelemetryId = case(
  // user telemetry id was introduced in the platform in version 20.0
  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A')
| summarize count(), sum( executionTimeInMS ), avg( executionTimeInMS ), sum(exclusiveTimeInMS), avg(exclusiveTimeInMS) by environmentName, alObjectInfo, alMethod, extensionInfo, clientType, alStackTrace, longRunningThreshold, longRunningThresholdInMS, sqlExecutes, sqlRowsRead, usertelemetryId, session_Id
| order by avg_executionTimeInMS desc 
| project 
    ["Environment Name"] = environmentName,
    ["AL Object Information"] = alObjectInfo,
    ["Extension Information"] = extensionInfo,
    ["Client Type"] = clientType,
    ["Ocurrance"] = count_,
    ["Avg Duration"] = round(avg_executionTimeInMS, 2),
    ["Total Duration"] = round(sum_executionTimeInMS,2),
    ["Avg Exclusive Time"] = round(avg_exclusiveTimeInMS,2),
    ["Total Exclusive Time"] = round(sum_exclusiveTimeInMS,2),
    ["SQL Executes"] = sqlExecutes,
    ["SQL Rows Read"] = sqlRowsRead,
    ["AL Method"] = alMethod,
    ["AL Stack Trace"] = alStackTrace,
    ["User Telemetry ID"] = usertelemetryId,
    ["Session Id"] = session_Id
| limit _maxCount

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0012'
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , stackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
| extend
   alObjectId = customDimensions.alObjectId
  , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
  , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
  , alObjectType = customDimensions.alObjectType
  , extensionVersion = customDimensions.extensionVersion
  , extensionInfo = strcat(extensionName, ' ', customDimensions.extensionVersion, 
    (iff(isnotempty(tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), strcat(' - ', tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), '')))
  , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
  , sqlServerSessionId = customDimensions.sqlServerSessionId
  , snapshotId = tostring(customDimensions.snapshotId)
  , timestamp
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp,5min), clientType

let _searchSting = 'AL CallStack: ';
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005'
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement has 'UPDLOCK'
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , stackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with tablenaamenojoins: string "\\$" newspace : string 
| parse kind=regex tablenaamenojoins with space2: string "\\$" onlytablenamenojoins: string 
//| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = case(
    tablenamewithjoins contains "$", onlytablenamenojoins
    , tablenamewithjoins 
)
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("\"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| project timestamp
, ["Client Type"] = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
, ["Duration (sec)"] = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000000 
, ["Object Information"] = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' ', 
    alObjectName)
, ["Stack Trace"] = substring(stackTrace, 
                            indexof(customDimensions.alStackTrace, _searchSting) + strlen(_searchSting))
, ["Extension Information"] = strcat(extensionName, ' ' , customDimensions.extensionVersion, ' - ',
    customDimensions.extensionPublisher)
, Table = tablename
| summarize ["Count"] = count(), ["Avg (sec)"] = round(avg(['Duration (sec)']),0) by ['Stack Trace'], ['Client Type'], ['Extension Information'], ['Object Information'], Table
| top 20 by ['Avg (sec)'] * Count desc

let _searchString = 'Job queue entry';
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId in ("AL0000E24", "AL0000E25", "AL0000E26","AL0000FNY","AL0000HE7","AL0000I49","AL0000FMG","AL0000FNY")
| extend _stateDescription = substring(message, strlen(_searchString), indexof(message, ':')-strlen(_searchString))
| extend alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectName)
| project  
    ["Entry Id"] = tostring(customDimensions.alJobQueueId),
    timestamp,
    ["Environment Type"] = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType),
    ["State"] = strcat(toupper(substring(_stateDescription, 1, 1)), substring(_stateDescription, 2)),
    ["Status"] = customDimensions.alJobQueueStatus, 
    ["Object Id"]  = customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectId,
    ["Object Type"] = customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectType,
    ["Object Name"]  = alObjectName,
    ["Recurring"] = customDimensions.alJobQueueIsRecurring,
    ["Task ID"] = customDimensions.alJobQueueScheduledTaskId,
    ["Session ID"] = session_Id,
    ["Telemetry ID"] = user_Id
| sort by timestamp asc

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == "RT0008"
| where isempty(['_WSType']) or toupper(customDimensions.category) in (['_WSType'])
| extend _endpoint = strcat("WS/", customDimensions.alObjectType,'/', customDimensions.alObjectId, '(',tostring(customDimensions.endpoint),')')
| extend _processingTimeMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.serverExecutionTime))/10000
| project ["Endpoint"] = _endpoint, 
        ["Object Type"] = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType), 
        ["Object No."] = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId), 
        _processingTimeMS, 
        ["Filters"] = tostring(customDimensions.queryFilter),
        ["Environment Type"] = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
| summarize count(), ["Avg. Time"] = round(avg(_processingTimeMS),2), ["Total Time"] = round(sum(_processingTimeMS),2) by ["Endpoint"], ["Object Type"], ["Object No."], ["Environment Type"], Filters
| sort by count_

let _maxCount = 20;
bctraces 
| where customDimensions.eventId == "RT0008"
| where isempty(['_WSType']) or toupper(customDimensions.category) in (['_WSType'])
| extend _endpoint = strcat("WS/", customDimensions.alObjectType,'/', customDimensions.alObjectId, '(',tostring(customDimensions.endpoint),')')
| extend _processingTimeMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.serverExecutionTime))/10000
| summarize ["API Duration"] = round(sum(_processingTimeMS),2) by ["Endpoint"] = _endpoint
| sort by ["API Duration"] desc 
| limit _maxCount

let _maxCount = 20;
bctraces 
| where customDimensions.eventId == "RT0008"
| where isempty(['_WSType']) or toupper(customDimensions.category) in (['_WSType'])
| extend _endpoint = strcat("WS/", customDimensions.alObjectType,'/', customDimensions.alObjectId, '(',tostring(customDimensions.endpoint),')')
| extend _processingTimeMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.serverExecutionTime))/10000
| summarize ["SOAP Calls"] = count() by ["Endpoint"] = _endpoint
| sort by ["SOAP Calls"] desc

let _maxCount = 20;
let _searchType = toupper('PAGE');
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0018'
| where toupper(customDimensions.alObjectType) == _searchType
| extend extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
  , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
  , alMethod = tostring( customDimensions.alMethod) 
| extend alObjectInfo = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' - ', alObjectName)
, executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
| extend executionTimeInSec = executionTimeInMS / 1000
| summarize count(), sum( executionTimeInSec ), avg( executionTimeInSec ) by alObjectInfo
| order by avg_executionTimeInSec desc 
| project ["AL Object Information"] = alObjectInfo,
    ["Ocurrance"] = count_,
    ["Avg Duration"] = round(avg_executionTimeInSec, 2),
    ["Total Duration"] = round(sum_executionTimeInSec,2)
| sort by Ocurrance desc
| limit _maxCount

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0018'

| extend extensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
  , alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)

, executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan

| summarize count(), sum( executionTimeInSec ), avg( executionTimeInSec ) by alObjectInfo
| order by avg_executionTimeInSec desc

    ["Avg Duration"] = round(avg_executionTimeInSec, 2),

| limit _maxCount

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId in ('AL0000E26')
| extend alJobQueueObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectName)
| extend alJobQueueObjectId = toint(customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectId)
    , alJobQueueObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alJobQueueObjectType)
    , alJobQueueExecutionTimeInSec = toreal(customDimensions.alJobQueueExecutionTimeInMs) /1000
| summarize 
    mintime = round(min(alJobQueueExecutionTimeInSec),0),
    avgTime = round(avg(alJobQueueExecutionTimeInSec),0),
    maxTime = round(max(alJobQueueExecutionTimeInSec),0),
    ExecutionCount = toint(count())
    by
    alJobQueueObjectId,
    alJobQueueObjectType,
    alJobQueueObjectName
| order by maxTime
| project
    ["Job Queue Object ID"] = alJobQueueObjectId,
    ["Job Queue Object Type"] = alJobQueueObjectType,
    ["Job Queue Object Name"] = alJobQueueObjectName,
    ["Execution Count"] = toint(ExecutionCount),
    ["Min. Time (sec)"] = mintime,
    ["Avg. Time (sec)"] = avgTime,
    ["Max. Time (sec)"] = maxTime
| sort by ['Execution Count'] desc

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId in ('LC0024', 'LC0025') 
| project 
  timestamp
, eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
, environmentType = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
, environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
, alObjectId = toint(customDimensions.alObjectId)
, alObjectName = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName),'GMK','')
, extensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
, extensionName = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.extensionName),'GMK','')
, keyMaintainSIFTIndex = tostring(customDimensions.keyMaintainSIFTIndex)
, keyMaintainSQLIndex = tostring(customDimensions.keyMaintainSQLIndex)
, keyFields = tostring(customDimensions.keyFields)
, keyName = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.keyName),'GMK','')
, message

bcpageviews
| where customDimensions.eventId == "CL0001"
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0
| extend alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
| extend alObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventID) // note that this is different from other signal
    , pageMode = tostring(customDimensions.pageMode)
    , pageType = tostring(customDimensions.pageType)
    , environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
| summarize 
    ExecutionCount = count(),
    minTime = toint(min(duration)),
    avgTime = toint(avg(duration)),
    maxTime = toint(max(duration))
    by
    alObjectId,
    alObjectName,
    eventId,
//    pageMode,
    pageType,
    environmentName
| project
    ["Environment Name"] = environmentName,
    ["AL Object ID"] = alObjectId,
    ["AL Object Name"] = alObjectName,
    ["Page Type"] = pageType,
//    ["Page Mode"] = pageMode,
    ["Execution Count"] = ExecutionCount,
    ["Min. Time"] = minTime,
    ["Avg. Time"] = avgTime,
    ["Max. Time"] = maxTime
| order by ['Execution Count'] desc

| project timestamp
, message
, applicationFamily = customDimensions.applicationFamily

, deletionReason = customDimensions.deletionReason

let environment_lifecycle_events = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'Dynamics 365 Business Central Control Plane'
| where customDimensions.eventId in ( 'LC0106', 'LC0114', 'LC0117', 'LC0120', 'LC0126', 'LC0134', 'LC0141', 'LC0142', 'LC0146', 'LC0150', 'LC0153', 'LC0159', 'LC0181' )
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Environment'
, operation = case(
    customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0106', 'Updated'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0114', 'Started'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0117', 'Stopped'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0120', 'Copied'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0126', 'Point-in-time restored' 
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0134', 'Moved to different AAD tenant' 
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0141', 'Database exported' 
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0142', 'Configuration key updated' 
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0146', 'Update window modified'         
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0150', 'Deleted (permanently)'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0153', 'Renamed'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0159', 'App hotfix applied'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0181', 'Deleted (marked for deletion)'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0184', 'Recovered (un-deleted)'            
  , 'Unknown event'
)
, onWhat = tostring( customDimensions.environmentName ) // which environment
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
;
let extension_lifecycle_events = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'RT0010'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0010'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0011'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0012'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0013'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0014'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0015'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0016'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0017'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0018'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0019'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0020'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0021'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0022'
     or customDimensions has 'LC0023'
| where customDimensions.eventId in ('RT0010', 'LC0010', 'LC0011', 'LC0012', 'LC0013', 'LC0014', 'LC0015', 'LC0016', 'LC0017', 'LC0018', 'LC0019', 'LC0020', 'LC0021', 'LC0022', 'LC0023')    
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Extension'
, operation = case(
    customDimensions.eventId=='RT0010', 'Update failed (upgrade code)'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0010', 'Install succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0011', 'Install failed'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0010', 'Install succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0012', 'Synch succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0013', 'Synch failed'           
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0014', 'Publish succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0015', 'Publish failed'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0016', 'Un-install succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0017', 'Un-install failed'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0018', 'Un-publish succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0019', 'Un-publish failed'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0020', 'Compilation succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0021', 'Compilation failed'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0022', 'Update succeeded'
  , customDimensions.eventId=='LC0023', 'Update failed (other)'
  , 'Unknown message'
)
, onWhat = replace_string(tostring( customDimensions.extensionName ),'GMK','') // which extension
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
;
let index_lifecycle_events = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'LC0024' 
     or customDimensions has 'LC0025'
| where customDimensions.eventId in ('LC0024', 'LC0025')
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Index'
, operation = case(
    customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0024', 'Added'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0025', 'Removed'
  , 'Unknown message'
)
, onWhat = replace_string(tostring( customDimensions.alObjectName ),'GMK','') // which table
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
;
let company_lifecycle_events = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'LC0001' 
     or customDimensions has 'LC0004' 
     or customDimensions has 'LC0007'
| where customDimensions.eventId in ('LC0001', 'LC0004', 'LC0007')
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Company'
, operation = case(
    customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0001', 'Company created'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0004', 'Company copied'
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0007', 'Company deleted'    
  ,                    'Unknown message'
)
, onWhat = case(
    customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0001', tostring( 'Redacted CompanyName' )
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0004', tostring( 'Redacted CompanyNameSource' )
  , customDimensions.eventId == 'LC0007', tostring( 'Redacted CompanyName' )
  ,                    'Unknown message'
) // which company
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
, usertelemetryId = case(
  // user telemetry id was introduced in the platform in version 20.0
  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A'
) // who did it
;
let feature_management_state_changes = 
// Feature management state changes
// Available from 22.0
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'AL0000JT3'
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'AL0000JT3'
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Feature'
, operation = tostring( customDimensions.alStatus) // enabled/disabled
, onWhat = tostring( customDimensions.alFeatureDescription ) // which feature
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
, usertelemetryId = user_Id // who did it
;
let retention_policy_deletes = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'AL0000D6H'
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'AL0000D6H'
| extend RecordsDeleted = toint(customDimensions.alRecordsDeleted)
, TableNumber = customDimensions.alTableNo
, TableName = replace_string(tostring( customDimensions.alTableName ),'GMK','')
| where RecordsDeleted > 0
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Data'
, operation = 'Data deleted'
, onWhat = TableName // which table
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
, usertelemetryId = case(
  // user telemetry id was introduced in the platform in version 20.0
  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A'
) // who did it
;
let field_changes = 
bctraces
| where customDimensions has 'AL0000CTE'
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'AL0000CTE'
| extend TableName = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.altableCaption),'GMK','')
  , FieldName = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.alfieldCaption),'GMK','')
| project timestamp
, entraTenantId = customDimensions.aadTenantId
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, whatChanged = 'Data'
, operation = 'Data changed'
, onWhat = strcat( TableName, '.', FieldName ) // which table.field
, sourceVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionSourceVersion)
, destinationVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionDestinationVersion)
, usertelemetryId = case(
  // user telemetry id was introduced in the platform in version 20.0
  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A'
) // who did it
;
environment_lifecycle_events
| union extension_lifecycle_events
| union index_lifecycle_events
| union company_lifecycle_events
| union feature_management_state_changes
| union retention_policy_deletes
| union field_changes

let dau_mau = 
bctraces
| extend aadTenantId = tostring( customDimensions.aadTenantId )
, environmentName = tostring( customDimensions.environmentName )
| evaluate activity_engagement(user_Id, timestamp, ago(40d), now(), 1d, 28d, aadTenantId, environmentName)
| project-rename Daily=dcount_activities_inner, Monthly=dcount_activities_outer
| project-away activity_ratio
| extend timestamp_truncated = startofday(timestamp)
;
let dau_wau = 
bctraces
| extend aadTenantId = tostring( customDimensions.aadTenantId )
, environmentName = tostring( customDimensions.environmentName )
| where timestamp > ago(10d) //bctraces selection must be > 10d
| evaluate activity_engagement(user_Id, timestamp, ago(40d), now(), 1d, 7d, aadTenantId, environmentName)
| project-rename Daily=dcount_activities_inner, Weekly=dcount_activities_outer
| project-away activity_ratio
| extend timestamp_truncated = startofday(timestamp)
;
dau_mau
| join kind=inner dau_wau 
on $left.aadTenantId == $right.aadTenantId 
and $left.environmentName == $right.environmentName
and $left.timestamp_truncated == $right.timestamp_truncated
| project-away aadTenantId1,timestamp_truncated1, timestamp, environmentName1,   timestamp1, Daily1
| project-rename timestamp=timestamp_truncated
| project format_datetime(timestamp, 'dd-MM-yyyy'), environmentName, Daily, Monthly, Weekly

| render columnchart  title= 'Number of long running AL Methods'

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0004'
| extend clientType = tostring( customDimensions.clientType )
| summarize request_count=count() by clientType, bin(timestamp, 1d)

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0012'
| project timestamp
, componentVersion = customDimensions.componentVersion
, environmentType = customDimensions.environmentType
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, aadTenantId = tostring(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
, alObjectId = customDimensions.alObjectId
, companyName = customDimensions.companyName
, clientType
, alObjectType = customDimensions.alObjectType
, alObjectName = customDimensions.alObjectName
, extensionVersion = customDimensions.extensionVersion
, extensionName = customDimensions.extensionName
, extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
, alStackTrace = customDimensions.alStackTrace
// use the KQL snippet parseStackTrace to get bottom of the stack trace details
, sqlStatement = customDimensions.sqlStatement
, sqlServerSessionId = customDimensions.sqlServerSessionId
, snapshotId = customDimensions.snapshotId
, sessionId = customDimensions.sessionId
, usertelemetryId = case(

  toint( substring(customDimensions.componentVersion,0,2)) >= 20, user_Id
, 'N/A'
)
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp,1d), clientType

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0028'
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , ExtensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
| extend TenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , ExtensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
    , ExtensionVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionVersion)
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablename: string "\\$" space: string
| extend splitStacktrace = split(StackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| project
    timestamp,
    TenantId,
    ExtensionId,
    ExtensionName,
    ExtensionVersion,
    ObjectType,
    ObjectId,
    ObjectName,
    operationType,
    numberOfJoins,
    LockingObject,
    LockingObjectId,
    LockingObjectMethod,
    LockingObjectExtension,    
    SourceProcess,
    StackTrace,
    sqlStatement,
    customDimensions
| summarize count = count() by tostring(SourceProcess), ExtensionId, tostring(LockingObjectExtension), ExtensionVersion, tostring(LockingObject), tostring(LockingObjectId), tostring(LockingObjectMethod),tostring(operationType),tostring(StackTrace),tostring(sqlStatement)
| order by ['count'],SourceProcess desc

, alPublisher = tostring(customDimensions.alPublisher)

, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.serverExecutionTime))/10000

// these lines illustrate how to extract data from the httpHeaders dimension

//| sort by count_ desc 
| summarize Occurrance = count(), Duration = round(sum(executionTimeInMS),0) by bin(timestamp, 1min)
| render timechart

bctraces

| extend numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")

| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)

let TableCount = (
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' // starting from version 16.1, the eventId is used to identity signal types
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 // filter out internal server calls
| project 
timestamp
, sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
, extensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
, extensionPublisher = tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)
, extensionName = trim('GMK',tostring(customDimensions.extensionName))
, alObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
, alObjectName = trim('GMK',tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName))
, alObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
| extend operationType = case(
  sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
, sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
, sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
, sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
, sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
, sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
, sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
, sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
, sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
, sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
, sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
, sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
, "UNKNOWN"
)
, dayBin = bin(timestamp,1d)
| extend day = strcat(strcat(format_datetime(dayBin, "yyyy-MM-dd"))," (Count)") 
| project-away timestamp, dayBin, executionTimeInMS
| sort by day asc 
| evaluate pivot(day, count())
);
TableCount
| join
(bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' // starting from version 16.1, the eventId is used to identity signal types
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 // filter out internal server calls
| project 
timestamp
, sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
, extensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
, extensionPublisher = tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)
, extensionName = trim('GMK',tostring(customDimensions.extensionName))
, alObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
, alObjectName = trim('GMK',tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName))
, alObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
// this part of the query derives various insights from the SQL statement
| extend operationType = case(
  sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
, sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
, sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
, sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
, sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
, sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
, sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
, sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
, sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
, sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
, sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
, sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
, sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
, "UNKNOWN"
)
, dayBin = bin(timestamp,1d)
| extend day = strcat(strcat(format_datetime(dayBin, "yyyy-MM-dd")), " (avg)")
| project-away timestamp, dayBin
| summarize Average = round(avg(executionTimeInMS),0) by extensionId, extensionPublisher, extensionName, alObjectType, alObjectId, alObjectName, operationType, sqlStatement, day
| sort by day asc 
| evaluate pivot(day,sum(Average))
)
on
$left.extensionId == $right.extensionId,
$left.extensionPublisher == $right.extensionPublisher,
$left.extensionName == $right.extensionName,
$left.alObjectType == $right.alObjectType,
$left.alObjectId == $right.alObjectId,
$left.alObjectName == $right.alObjectName,
$left.operationType == $right.operationType,

let ObjectNameAndClientLRQCount= (

| extend alObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
| extend eventId = customDimensions.eventId 
, environmentName = customDimensions.environmentName
, sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
, companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
, extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
, extensionInfo = strcat(customDimensions.extensionName, ' ', customDimensions.extensionVersion, 
    (iff(isnotempty(tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), strcat(' - ', tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), '')))
, alObjectInfo = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' - ', customDimensions.alObjectName)
, alStackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
, alObjectId = customDimensions.alObjectId
, alObjectType = customDimensions.alObjectType
, executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000  
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
)
, withUPDLOCK = iff(customDimensions.sqlStatement has 'UPDLOCK','Yes', 'No')
, numberOfJoins = countof(sqlStatement, "JOIN") 
, numberOfFlowFields = countof(sqlStatement, "OUTER APPLY") 
, extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement) )
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart:string "FROM" rest:string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = case(
    operationType == "SELECT", countof(selectPart,",") + 1
    , operationType == "SELECT'", countof(selectPart,",") + 1
    , 0
)
, isolationLevel = tostring(case(
    sqlStatement has 'WITH(UPDLOCK)', 'UPDLOCK'
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(READUNCOMMITTED)', 'ReadUncommitted'
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(READCOMMITTED)', 'ReadCommitted' 
  , sqlStatement has 'WITH(REPEATABLEREAD)', 'RepeatableRead' 
  , 'Default'
))
| sort by executionTimeInMS desc 
| project timestamp, 
    ["Environment Name"] = environmentName,

    ["AL Object ID"] = tostring(alObjectId),

    ["AL Object Name"] = tostring(alObjectName),

    ["Type"] = operationType, 
    ["FlowFields"] = numberOfFlowFields, 
    ["JOINs"] = numberOfJoins, 
    ["with UPDLOCK"] = withUPDLOCK,
    ["Company Name"] = companyName, 
    ["AL Object Information"] = alObjectInfo, 
    ["Extension Information"] = extensionInfo,
    ["Operation Type"] = operationType,
    ["Isolation Level"] = isolationLevel,
    ["User Telemetry ID"] = user_Id,
    ["Session Id"] = session_Id,
    ["SQL Statement"] = sqlStatement,
    ["AL Stack Trace"] = alStackTrace
| summarize count(), round(avg(Duration),0) by ['AL Object ID'], ['AL Object Type'], ['AL Object Name'], ['Client Type'], ['Operation Type'], ['Isolation Level'], ['SQL Statement'], ['AL Stack Trace']
| sort by count_ desc 
);
ObjectNameAndClientLRQCount

| sort by count_ desc

    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with tablenaamenojoins: string "\\$" newspace : string 
| parse kind=regex tablenaamenojoins with space2: string "\\$" onlytablenamenojoins: string 
//| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = case(
    tablenamewithjoins contains "$", onlytablenamenojoins
    , tablenamewithjoins 
)
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("\"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| where tablename <> ""
| summarize Count = count() by tablename, clientType

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0028'
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend TenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , ExtensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
    , ExtensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
    , ExtensionVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionVersion)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)        
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = case(
    tablenamewithjoins contains "$", tablenamewithoutjoins
    , tablenamewithjoins 
)
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp,5min), clientType
| project timestamp, count_, clientType
| render columnchart

let correctedEndTime = datetime_add('hour',12,_endTime);
bctraces
| where timestamp <= (correctedEndTime)// adjust as needed
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0018' 
| extend alObjectName = trim(@'GMK',tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName))
| extend extensionName = trim(@'GMK',tostring(customDimensions.extensionName))
| extend eventId = customDimensions.eventId 
, extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
, extensionInfo = strcat(extensionName, ' ', customDimensions.extensionVersion, 
    (iff(isnotempty(tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), strcat(' - ', tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)), '')))
, alObjectInfo = strcat(customDimensions.alObjectType, ' ', customDimensions.alObjectId, ' - ', alObjectName)
, alStackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
, clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
, alObjectId = customDimensions.alObjectId
, alObjectType = customDimensions.alObjectType
, executionTimeInMS = toint(round(toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000,0)) 
, negativeExecutionTimeInMS = toint((round(toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000,0)) * -1) 
, alMethod = trim(@'GMK',tostring(customDimensions.alMethod))
| extend correctedStartTime = datetime_add('millisecond',negativeExecutionTimeInMS, timestamp)
| where correctedStartTime <= _endTime
| extend runningDuration = iff(timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
    ,iff(correctedStartTime < _startTime, toint(round(toreal(totimespan(timestamp - _startTime))/10000,0)),toint(round(toreal(totimespan(timestamp - correctedStartTime))/10000,0)))
    ,toint(round(toreal(totimespan(_endTime - correctedStartTime))/10000,0)))
| extend outboundEvent = iff(correctedStartTime < _startTime, true, iff(timestamp > _endTime,true,false))
| sort by correctedStartTime asc 
| project ["Start Time"] = correctedStartTime,
    ["End Time"] = timestamp, 
    ["Total Event Duration"] = executionTimeInMS, 
    ["Running Duration"] = runningDuration, //Since when it was running, when the event happened
    ["Outbound"] = outboundEvent,
    ["Client Type"] = clientType, 
    ["AL Object ID"] = alObjectId,
    ["AL Object Type"] = alObjectType,
    ["AL Object Name"] = alObjectName,
    ["AL Object Method"] = alMethod,
    ["Extension Information"] = extensionInfo,
    ["User Telemetry ID"] = user_Id,
    ["Session Id"] = session_Id,
    ["AL Stack Trace"] = alStackTrace

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0005' // starting from version 16.1, the eventId is used to identity signal types
| where customDimensions.alObjectId > 0 // filter out internal server calls
| extend duration = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
| extend sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , "OTHERS"
)
, withUPDLOCK = iff(customDimensions.sqlStatement has 'UPDLOCK','Yes', 'No')
| extend isLocking = iff(withUPDLOCK == 'Yes', 'Yes', 
     iff(operationType in ("UPDATE","DELETE","INSERT"), 'Yes', 'No'))
| project timestamp, isLocking, duration
| summarize sum(duration) by bin(timestamp, 10min), isLocking
| render timechart

let TableDeadlocked = (
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0012'
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend TenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , ExtensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
    , ExtensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
    , ExtensionVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionVersion)
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)        
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with tablenaamenojoins: string "\\$" newspace : string 
| parse kind=regex tablenaamenojoins with space2: string "\\$" onlytablenamenojoins: string 
//| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("\"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| where tablename <> ""
| summarize Count = count() by tablename, clientType
);
TableDeadlocked
| extend Percentage = round(Count *100 / toscalar(TableDeadlocked | summarize sum(Count)),2)
| sort by Count desc

    ["User Telemetry ID"] = user_Id,
    ["Session Id"] = session_Id,
    ["AL Stack Trace"] = alStackTrace

bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0006'
| where customDimensions.result == "Success"
| where customDimensions.reportingEngine != "ProcessingOnly"
| extend extensionName = trim('GMK', tostring(customDimensions.extensionName))
  , alObjectName = trim('GMK',tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName))
  , alMethod = trim('GMK',tostring( customDimensions.alMethod))

, totalTime = customDimensions.totalTime
, totalTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.totalTime))/10000 //the datatype for executionTime is timespan 
| extend totalTimeInSec = totalTimeInMS / 1000
, intent = tostring(customDimensions.sqlDatabaseAccessIntent)
, reportAction = tostring(customDimensions.reportAction)
, reportingEngine = tostring(customDimensions.reportingEngine)
, documentFormat = tostring(customDimensions.documentFormat)
, sqlExecutes = toint(customDimensions.sqlExecutes)
, sqlRowsRead = toint(customDimensions.sqlRowsRead)
, numberOfRows = toint(customDimensions.numberOfRows)

, intent, reportAction, reportingEngine, documentFormat
| order by avg_totalTimeInSec desc 
| project ["AL Object Information"] = alObjectInfo,
    intent,
    reportAction,
    reportingEngine,
    documentFormat,
    ["Ocurrance"] = count_,
    ["Avg Duration"] = round(avg_totalTimeInSec, 2),
    ["Total Duration"] = round(sum_totalTimeInSec,2),
    ["Avg SQL Executes"] = round(avg_sqlExecutes, 0),
    ["Avg SQL Rows Read"] = round(avg_sqlRowsRead,0),
    ["Avg Dataset Rows"] = avg_numberOfRows
| sort by Ocurrance desc

let TableDeadlocked = (
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0028'
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend entraTenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , environmentType = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
    , environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
    , ExtensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
    , ExtensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
    , ExtensionVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionVersion)
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)        
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with tablenaamenojoins: string "\\$" newspace : string 
| parse kind=regex tablenaamenojoins with space2: string "\\$" onlytablenamenojoins: string 
//| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = case(
    tablenamewithjoins contains "$", onlytablenamenojoins
    , tablenamewithjoins 
)
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("\"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| where tablename <> ""
| summarize Count = count() by entraTenantId, environmentType, environmentName, companyName, tablename
);

let TableDeadlocked = (
bctraces
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0012'
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend entraTenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , environmentType = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
    , environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
    , ExtensionId = tostring(customDimensions.extensionId)
    , ExtensionName = tostring(customDimensions.extensionName)
    , ExtensionVersion = tostring(customDimensions.extensionVersion)
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)        
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablenamewithjoins: string "\\$" space: string
| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with tablenaamenojoins: string "\\$" newspace : string 
| parse kind=regex tablenaamenojoins with space2: string "\\$" onlytablenamenojoins: string 
//| parse kind=regex tablenamewithjoins with stringtoeliminate: string "\\$" tablenamewithoutjoins: string
| extend tablename = case(
    tablenamewithjoins contains "$", onlytablenamenojoins
    , tablenamewithjoins 
)
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| where tablename <> ""
| summarize Count = count() by entraTenantId, environmentType, environmentName, companyName, tablename
);
TableDeadlocked
| extend Percentage = round(Count *100 / toscalar(TableDeadlocked | summarize sum(Count)),2)
| sort by Count desc

| where customDimensions.pageType !contains "Dialog"

    | project timestamp
        , entraTenantId = tostring(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
        , environmentType = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
        , environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
        , session_Id

    | distinct entraTenantId, environmentType, environmentName, componentVersion
);
let PlatformUpdates = (
    bctraces
    | extend entraTenantId = tostring(customDimensions.aadTenantId) 
        , environmentName = tostring( customDimensions.environmentName )
        , environmentType = tostring(customDimensions.environmentType)
        , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
    | where componentVersion <> ""
    | summarize max(bin(timestamp,1sec)) by entraTenantId, environmentType, environmentName, componentVersion
);
PlatformUpdates

    $left.environmentType == $right.environmentType,
    $left.environmentName == $right.environmentName,
    $left.componentVersion == $right.componentVersion
| where max_timestamp < ago(1h) //to remove the latest record (the current component version)
| sort by max_timestamp desc

| extend Hour = hourofday(maxTimestampInLocalTime)
| summarize Occurrance = count() by Hour
| sort by Hour asc

| sort by max_timestamp desc 
| extend maxTimestampInLocalTime = datetime_utc_to_local(max_timestamp,"Europe/Rome") //From UTC to local time
| extend day = substring(tostring(dayofweek(maxTimestampInLocalTime)),0,1)
| extend weekDay = case( 
    day == "1", "Monday",
    day == "2", "Tuesday",
    day == "3", "Wednesday",
    day == "4", "Thursday",
    day == "5", "Friday",
    day == "6", "Saturday", 
    day == "0", "Sunday",
    "DoomsDay"
)
| summarize Occurrance = count() by weekDay, day
| sort by day asc 
| project-away day
| render columnchart
